alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:44PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Niobrara, northwestern Goshen, northeastern Platte and east central Converse Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 644 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Keeline, or 14 miles west of Lusk, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manville around 655 PM MDT. Lusk around 710 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lost Springs. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 115 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County
